structure.unit: Courts, Judicial Officers And Proceedings In Civil Cases
Jurisdiction Of Courts Of The Commonwealth Over Persons In Other States And Countries

law.text: As used in this chapter, “person” includes an individual, his executor, administrator or other personal representative, or a corporation, partnership, association or any other legal or commercial entity, whether or not a citizen or domiciliary of this commonwealth and whether or not organized under the laws of this commonwealth.
